general-menu.title: Veg pizza
general-menu.desc: A delight for veggie lovers! Choose from our wide range of delicious vegetarian pizzas, it's softer and tastier

general-menu.title: Non veg pizza
general-menu.desc: Choose your favourite non-veg pizzas from the Domino's Pizza menu. Get fresh non-veg pizza at your doorstep

general-menu.title: pizza mania
general-menu.desc: Indulge into mouth-watering taste of Pizza mania range, perfect answer to all your food cravings

general-menu.title: sides & Bevaerages
general-menu.desc: Complement your pizza with wide range of sides & beverages available at pirai's Pizza India

Veg pizza.title: Margherita
Veg pizza.desc: A hugely popular margherita, with a deliciously tangy single cheese topping
Veg pizza.o_desc: Classic delight with 100% real mozzarella cheese

Veg pizza.title: Farm House
Veg pizza.desc: A pizza that goes ballistic on veggies! Check out this mouth watering overload of crunchy, crisp capsicum, succulent mushrooms and fresh tomatoes
Veg pizza.o_desc: Delightful combination of onion, capsicum, tomato & grilled mushroom

Veg pizza.title: Double Cheese Margherita
Veg pizza.desc: The ever-popular Margherita - loaded with extra cheese... oodies of it!
Veg pizza.o_desc: Delightful combination of onion, capsicum, tomato & grilled mushroom

Veg pizza.title: Peppy Paneer
Veg pizza.desc: Chunky paneer with crisp capsicum and spicy red pepper - quite a mouthful!
Veg pizza.o_desc: Flavorful trio of juicy paneer, crisp capsicum with spicy red paprika

Veg pizza.title: Mexican Green Wave
Veg pizza.desc: A pizza loaded with crunchy onions, crisp capsicum, juicy tomatoes and jalapeno with a liberal sprinkling of exotic Mexican herbs.
Veg pizza.o_desc: Mexican herbs sprinkled on onion, capsicum, tomato & jalapeno

Veg pizza.title: Veggie Paradise
Veg pizza.desc: Goldern Corn, Black Olives, Capsicum & Red Paprika
Veg pizza.o_desc: The awesome foursome! Golden corn, black olives, capsicum, red paprika

Non veg pizza.o_desc: Classic delight with 100% real mozzarella cheese

Non veg pizza.title: Chicken Golden Delight
Non veg pizza.desc: Mmm! Barbeque chicken with a topping of golden corn loaded with extra cheese. Worth its weight in gold!

Non veg pizza.title: Non Veg Supreme
Non veg pizza.desc: Bite into supreme delight of Black Olives, Onions, Grilled Mushrooms, Pepper BBQ Chicken, Peri-Peri Chicken, Grilled Chicken Rashers

Non veg pizza.title: Chicken Dominator
Non veg pizza.desc: Treat your taste buds with Double Pepper Barbecue Chicken, Peri-Peri Chicken, Chicken Tikka & Grilled Chicken Rashers
